content:
User: CEO-in-Training Standards: It’s lean, data-driven, and prioritizes velocity while staying Charter-aligned. I’ve added metric extraction (e.g., latency, clarity) to the comms structure for continuous improvement, per our adaptive refinement principle.

Grok: Claude’s Style: It’s in PURE_AI_LANGUAGE, respects his leadership, and gives him room to run while keeping us in sync.
